sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './App.css' export default function App() { const [a, setA] = useState([]); const [count, setCount] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8081/cddemo') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setA(data); }) }, []) const handleCount = () => { fetch('http://localhost:8081/count') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setCount(a.length); }) } const insertrecord = () => { fetch('http://localhost:8081/insert') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setA(prev => [...prev, data]); }) } return (
{a.map((p, index) => (<> ))}
ID NAME STATE ADDRESS
{p.id} {p.name} {p.state} {p.address}

Records : {count}

) }
